spell.name: Shadow's Veil
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to weave illusions. When you Cast the Spell, you Perform, Hide, Sneak, or roll Initiative (Performance or Stealth). You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill check. The bonus is applied any time you take one of the action, as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Shadow's Veil

spell.name: Lesser Shadow

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Shadow, you choose to replicate Pass without Trace, Penumbral Shroud, Darkness, or Invisibility. Lesser Shadow gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Shadow.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.greater: You may cast Lesser Shadow up to two times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.grand: You may cast Lesser Shadow up to three times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Lesser Shadow any number of times per daily preparation.
